lead_paragraph: CEDARBAUM--Miriam Goldman. With heartfelt sadness, the Trustees and Administration of Barnard College mourn the passing of the Honorable Miriam Goldman Cedarbaum '50, who was a devoted alumna, a Barnard Trustee from 1993 to 2004, and an active trustee emerita. In 1991, she received the College's highest honor, the Barnard Medal of Distinction, for the stellar example she set for women in the legal profession, for her wise and profound counsel, and for all she has done for her alma mater. Barnard honors the memory of this extraordinary woman and extends its deepest sympathies to her family and many friends. Jolyne Caruso-FitzGerald, Chair, Board of Trustees Debora Spar, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CEDARBAUM, MIRIAM GOLDMAN
